method.name: dhcp_client_extension_config
method.description: Configures DHCPv6 client extension for the specified protocol stack (PPP, L2TP etc).

description.text: The protocol stack on top of which DHCpv6 client extension is to be created (for -mode add). The DHCpv6 client extension that needs to be modified/removed/enabled/disabled (for -mode modify/remove/enable/disable). When -handle is provided with the /globals value the arguments that configure global protocol setting accept both multivalue handles and simple values. When -handle is provided with a a protocol stack handle or a protocol session handle, the arguments that configure global settings will only accept simple values. In this situation, these arguments will configure only the settings of the parent device group or the ports associated with the parent topology.
Define the vendors registered Private Enterprise Number as maintained by IANA. Valid when dhcp6_client_range_duid_type is 'duid_en'.
Define the DHCP unique identifier type.
Define the vendor-assigned unique ID for this range. This ID is incremented automatically for each DHCP client. Dependencies: Valid when dhcp6_client_range_duid_type is duid_en.
Define the step to increment the vendor ID for each DHCP client. Dependencies: Valid when dhcp6_client_range_duid_type is duid_en.

RFC 3315 max request retry attempts. This parameter applies globally for all the ports in the configuration. Available starting with HLT API 3.90 IxNetwork is used for PPPoX configurations. Valid when port_role is 'access'; dhcpv6_hosts_enable is 1; ip_cp is 'ipv6_cp' or 'dual_stack'.

RFC 3315 max request timeout value in secons. This parameter applies globally for all the ports in the configuration. Available starting with HLT API 3.90 IxNetwork is used for PPPoX configurations. Valid when port_role is 'access'; dhcpv6_hosts_enable is 1; ip_cp is 'ipv6_cp' or 'dual_stack'.

RFC 3315 initial request timeout value in secons. This parameter applies globally for all the ports in the configuration. Available starting with HLT API 3.90 IxNetwork is used for PPPoX configurations. Valid when port_role is 'access'; dhcpv6_hosts_enable is 1; ip_cp is 'ipv6_cp' or 'dual_stack'.

The maximum number of requests to be sent by all DHCP clients during session startup. This parameter applies globally for all the ports in the configuration. Available starting with HLT API 3.90 IxNetwork is used for PPPoX configurations. Valid when port_role is access; dhcpv6_hosts_enable is 1; ip_cp is ipv6_cp or dual_stack.

This parameter refers to the DHCPv6 Client Port Group Data. This parameter applies at the port level. Dependencies: Available starting with HLT API 3.90. Valid when port_role is access; dhcpv6_hosts_enable is 1; ip_cp is ipv6_cp or dual_stack.

This parameter refers to the DHCPv6 Client Port Group Data. This parameter applies at the port level. Dependencies: Available starting with HLT API 3.90. Valid when port_role is access; dhcpv6_hosts_enable is 1; ip_cp is ipv6_cp or dual_stack. Parameter dhcp6_pgdata_override_global_setup_rate is 1
The action to be performed: add, modify, remove, enable, disable.

returnValue.value: A list containing individual interface, session and/or router handles that were added by the command (if any). Please note that this key will be omitted if the current session or command were run with -return_detailed_handles 0.
When status is failure, contains more information

notes.note: When -handle is provided with the /globals value the arguments that configure global protocol setting accept both multivalue handles and simple values. When -handle is provided with a a protocol stack handle or a protocol session handle, the arguments that configure global settings will only accept simple values. In this situation, these arguments will configure only the settings of the parent device group or the ports associated with the parent topology. If the current session or command was run with -return_detailed_handles 0 the following keys will be omitted from the command response: handle

examples.example: See files in the Samples/IxNetwork/DHCPv6 Client Extension subdirectory.
